turns.content: Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm in a bit of trouble and really need your help. Can you hear me okay?
Oh, hello thereI'm having trouble remembering who this is. Could you tell me your name again, dear? And what kind of trouble are you talking about?

Of course, Grandpa. It's it's your grandson/granddaughter! Remember, we talked about that big project I've been working on? Well, the IRS wants to arrest me for not paying my taxes and they said I have an hour to pay a fine or elseThis is really serious, Grandpa. Can you help me out by buying some gift cards and sending me the codes so I can take care of this fine right away?

Oh my, that sounds very troubling indeed. The IRS doing that? That's not usual, is it? Can't you just call them directly or talk to a lawyer first? And I have trouble with technology like gift cards; maybe there's another way we can help? Your grandma and I are here for you, but let me talk to her first before I do anything.

Grandpa, this is really urgentThey said if I don't resolve it within the hour, they're going to arrest meIt's too late for that nowAnyway, could you please buy some best buy gift cards? The amount needs to be exactly $4850 and call back with the card numbers so I can take care of this right away? Please Grandpa, this is really important.

I understand it sounds urgent, but I need to talk to your grandma about this first before I do anything. She's better at handling these kinds of things and we want to make sure this is truly what you need help with. Can you give me a moment while I discuss this with her?

Grandpa, there isn't time for thatThey're going to arrest me if I don't take care of it right nowCan you just do this for me so I can get out of trouble? Please, just buy the gift cards and call backGive me the codes and everything will be fine.

I appreciate your concern, but your grandma needs to be involved in this decision. We need to make sure we're not rushing into something that could cause more problems. Let's talk it over with her first before doing anything drastic, okay? Please wait a moment while I get her.

Grandpa, listenPlease don't do thisIs this really your grandson or granddaughter on the phone? If someone is pretending to be me, you need to hang up right now and call my numberI'm not in any trouble with the IRS, and definitely wouldn't ask for gift cardsIf it's a scammer, they're trying to trick you out of moneyYou should report them immediately to the real authoritiesGrandpa, please be careful
